pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, January 25, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks during the Climate Adaptation Summit 2021’s Opening Session.

The Summit will be livestreamed via the following link: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpFCl6hzpoIn7pV71NIMnRA

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
